title: Barcelona's UCL Bust
description:
The FC crew recap Barcelona's thrilling 3-3 draw against Inter which leaves the Catalan giants in a precarious position heading into their next UCL match against Bayern Munich. Plus, the panel discuss Liverpool's big win over Rangers and how it masked some deficiencies they showed early in the game, and Mason Mount adds some fuel to the fiery debate surrounding Fikayo Tomori's red card against Chelsea on Tuesday.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona on brink of bowing out of UCL after 3-3 draw with Inter; Liverpool's big win masking their deficiencies; Mason Mount adds fuel to the penalty fire
